tasks.task: Fix header layout for proper button positioning (AC: 1, 2)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I view the Events page on desktop, when I look at action buttons, then they don't overlap with header
Given I view the Events page, when I look at action buttons, then there's clear visual separation from navigation
Given I view the Events page on mobile, when I look at action buttons, then they're positioned appropriately
Given I view the Events page on mobile, when I tap action buttons, then touch targets are at least 44x44px
